set(SKIA_DUILIB_X ON)
add_subdirectory(zlib)
add_subdirectory(cximage)
add_subdirectory(libpng)
add_subdirectory(libwebp)
add_subdirectory(skia)


set(DUILIB_CEF_109 ON)
if(CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME STREQUAL "Windows")
if(DUILIB_CEF_109)
add_subdirectory(libcef_win_109)
else()
add_subdirectory(libcef_win)
endif()
elseif(CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME STREQUAL "Linux")
add_subdirectory(libcef_linux)
elseif(APPLE)
add_subdirectory(libcef_macos)
elseif(CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME STREQUAL "FreeBSD")
else()
    message(WARNING "Unknown OS: ${CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME}")
endif()
